programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Polar Bears
programme.desc: Dennis follows the mother bear and her two cubs as they prepare to step onto the precarious ice and confront even bigger challenges than before.

programme.title: Return Of The Predators
programme.desc: After 30 years of war and destruction, Gorongosa National Park in Mozambique has undergone a remarkable restoration. Herbivores once again bound across the plains, but hunters have been slower to return, leaving the park out of balance..until now!.

programme.title: Killer Animal Tactics
programme.desc: From top predators to clever creatures, these killers are some of the most armed and dangerous animals in the world. In order to survive, they use some of the scariest strategies and lethal weapons like ambush, camouflage, claws and paws, venom, pack hunting and more to take down prey. The name of the game is kill or be killed!.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killers
programme.desc: In the darkest corners of the world, deadly predators watch and wait for their next, unsuspecting prey. Armed with special nighttime powers, including extra-strength night vision and hypersensitive hearing, these creatures are anatomically designed to succeed in the dark.

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Journey with JT Reynolds, Death Valley's larger-than-life superintendent, and meet the scientists who are working to protect this wild place as the mercury rises.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: In the Highlands, Charlotte and Petal go in search of new territory and potential mates.Over in the Flatlands, Buttercup and her siblings must figure out how to survive without parental supervision.

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Canyonlands is the little known jewel of the American national parks. But this rugged terrain is a more than a pretty picture; it is a history book of time. .

programme.title: America's Wild Spaces
programme.desc: Papahanaumokuakea Marine National Monument, encompasses the Northwestern Hawaiian Islands. A month long scientific expedition will journey to these remote waters to map the uncharted.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: This episode reveals the secret tactics of the Animal Kingdom's most ferocious feline fighters, and brings you closer than ever before to adrenaline-packed fights from Africa, the Americas and beyond. From the big to the small, the fearsome to the furry, the world's most crazy cat contenders make for an adrenaline-fueled Animal Fight Club.

programme.title: Predator V Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Asia's Wild Secrets: Compilation
programme.desc: Across Asia, young animals are thrust into relentless battles, fighting tooth and claw for their very survival.Each day brings a new set of challenges and dangers.

Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Predator V Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories. A male crocodile must target large prey in a bid to survive the harshest time of the year.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The clinic is slammed with summertime cases as the vets battle to save a badly injured cat, a farm dog with a puncture wound, and a wobbling mini horse struggling to walk. The team is seeing double as pairs of ferrets and chickens come through the door. Doc and Dianes new puppy brings chaos and cuteness to the clinic.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Armed with a bucket and tube, Dr. Pol works tirelessly to help a horse struggling with choke. Inside the clinic, Dr. Lisa tackles the many maladies of Mushi the cat, and Dr. Brenda treats a fussy feline. Something odd happens when Doc meets another DocDr. Strange the steer. Charles is worried about his dog Athena and looks to his dad for guidance. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The staffers become the clients as they bring in their pets for the vets to treat. Dr. Pol builds a special cast for an injured calf, Dr. Lisa chases a pair of goats, and Dr. Brenda has to change her plans when a reindeers symptoms suddenly change. With a goose, bunny, and pregnant pup all at the clinic, the staff works hard keeping Pol Vet running smoothly. .

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: The physical attributes of felines make them unsurpassed, gifted athletes who combine strength and agility with extraordinary sensory capabilities; like the cheetah.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Despite their ancient appearance, reptiles are creatures full of surprises and sophistication. Much like dinosaurs, reptiles are hugely efficient hunters..

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: When on the hunt, snakes judge to perfection the very instant that separates life from death. Venomous snakes are one of the most lethal animals on the planet. .

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Wolves are a supreme example of cooperative hunting, their efficiency based on hierarchy within a pack that demands loyalty..

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Bears are among the most supreme predators on Earth. The turning of the seasons provokes profound changes in bears' bodies, allowing them to endure the harshest conditions. .

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.
